from scapy.all import *
conf.iface = 'ens7f0'
conf_pkt = "0000000000000100000000000000000000000000000008a10b910c230d250e2700000000000000000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "0000000005000100000000000000000000000000000008a10b910c230d250e2700000000000000000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "0000000001000100000000000000000000000000000000000c0000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "00000000010f01000000000000000000000000000000ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff0000ffff80"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "000000000200000000000000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000000000000000000001a00000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "00000000020f00000000000000000000000000000000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e0000028c8007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f0000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "000000000200010000000000000000000000000000000010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000d00000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "00000000020f01000000000000000000000000000000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e0000018c8007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f000007800003c00001e00000f0000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "000000001300010000000000000000000000000000000400"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "000000001300020000000000000000000000000000000404"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "000000001300030000000000000000000000000000000408"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))
conf_pkt = "00000000130004000000000000000000000000000000040c"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=0xf1f2)/bytes.fromhex(conf_pkt))


test_pkt = "00000000001a00000003000000020000000000000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=4096)/bytes.fromhex(test_pkt))

test_pkt = "00000000000d00000003000000020000000000000000"
sendp(Ether(dst="00:0a:35:28:69:0a")/IP(dst="192.168.40.123")/UDP(dport=4096)/bytes.fromhex(test_pkt))
